sn24.5:4.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.5:4.3: ‘natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko;
sn24.5:4.4: natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikā;
sn24.5:4.5: natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedenti.
sn24.5:4.6: Cātumahābhūtiko ayaṃ puriso yadā kālaṃ karoti pathavī pathavīkāyaṃ anupeti anupagacchati, āpo āpokāyaṃ anupeti anupagacchati, tejo tejokāyaṃ anupeti anupagacchati, vāyo vāyokāyaṃ anupeti anupagacchati.
sn24.5:4.12: Dattupaññattaṃ yadidaṃ dānaṃ.
sn24.5:4.13: Tesaṃ tucchaṃ musā vilāpo ye keci atthikavādaṃ vadanti.
sn24.5:4.14: Bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.5:5.1: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.5:5.3: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā’ti.
sn24.5:5.7: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.5:5.9: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā’ti.
sn24.5:6.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.5:6.3: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.5:6.5: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.5:6.12: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.5:6.14: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.5:6.16: “Yampidaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.5:6.18: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.5:6.21: bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.5:7.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti … pe …
sn24.5:7.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
